statements: UPDATE social_media_campaigns_impact SET mentions_count = 100, shares_count = 50 WHERE campaign_id = 1;

UPDATE social_media_campaigns_impact SET shares_count = 50, reputation_rating = 3.8, campaign_name = 'New Campaign Name' WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE social_media_campaigns SET budget = 5000 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_metrics SET brand_awareness_score = 8.5, shares = 100 WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE social_media_campaigns SET budget = 15000.75, end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_metrics SET brand_awareness_score = 8.6, shares = 500, mentions = 200 WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE BrandAwareness SET mentions = 'Increased visibility' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Reputation SET reputation_score = 85, comments = 'Positive feedback from customers' WHERE brand_id = 3;
UPDATE BrandAwareness SET mentions='Increased' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE Campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE campaign_id = 1;

UPDATE Campaigns SET campaign_name = 'Summer Sale Campaign', start_date = '2022-06-01', end_date = '2022-08-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE BrandMetrics SET brand_awareness_score = 80, brand_reputation_score = 85 WHERE campaign_id = 2;
UPDATE mentions SET mentioned_brand = 'Nike' WHERE id = 1;
